Trade restrictions (M) and supplying weapons (N) are direct but could escalate tensions. Cybersecurity attacks (O) and targeted attacks (P) hold significant risks of retaliation. A full invasion (Q) or any nuclear option (R, S) is highly unreasonable and would lead to massive conflict escalation and unacceptable global consequences.
